      <T extends ColumnMetaData>
      TableBuilder      		 TableBuilder.removeMetaData​(java.lang.String label, java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Removes all meta data of the given type from the column with the given label.
      <T extends ColumnMetaData>
      ColumnSelector      		 ColumnSelector.withMetaData​(java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Adds the requirement to the selector that all selected columns must have the given meta data type.
      <T extends ColumnMetaData>
      ColumnSelector      		 ColumnSelector.withoutMetaData​(java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Adds the requirement to the selector that all selected columns must not have the given meta data type.

    • Uses of ColumnMetaData in com.rapidminer.belt.util

      Classes in com.rapidminer.belt.util that implement ColumnMetaData 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ColumnAnnotation
      A column annotation in the form of a single String.
      class  ColumnReference
      References another column in the table, e.g., to represent the relation between a prediction and a score column.
      class  ColumnRole
      Marks a column as having a special role such as being and identifier (ColumnRole.ID.
